section.p: The terrified islanders swarm about your ship. Women and children are put in the hold, and any cargo you had is jettisoned (cross it off the Ship’s Manifest). Others must cling to the rigging or perch on the rail. The extra load makes the ship float alarmingly low in the water.
As you put out from the shore, the volcano is already starting to spit out long fiery torrents of lava. But the danger isn’t over yet.
. Subtract 1 if your ship is a barque; add 1 if it is a galleon.
